page.title: 07POSTLIP MILL - Pt.1
page.content: Postlip Mill was first recorded as milling flour around 1066, using a large water wheel. Paper has been manufactured at Postlip Mill since 1733 when John Durham began the Mills. By the late 18th C. three mills were in operation at Upper - Middle -and Lower Mill. During the Second World War,P.M. made blotting paper. After the War typewriters and ball point pens became common and blotting paper was used less and less until it went out of production. Today P.M. make both ordinary as well as filter paper. A large amount of filter paper is used in a car's engine to filter oil and air. Filter paper is also used for coffee filter machines, beer making, wines, spirits,paint, varnish and the manufacture of the drink Ribena. (5)
